**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 132 2.0 **Usage** held in 1 hand **Bulk** 1 --- A multi-hued array of scales covers a _dragonprism staff_, forming a gradient of color, and a dragon's claw holds a gem upon the staff's head. [Dragons](/Traits.aspx?ID=50) give allies these staves as a mark of esteem. While wielding a _dragonprism staff_ you seem fiercer, gaining a +1 circumstance bonus to [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) checks to [Demoralize](/Actions.aspx?ID=53). **Activate** Cast a Spell; **Effect** You expend a number of charges from the staff to cast a spell from its list. **Craft Requirements** Supply one casting of all listed levels of all listed spells. Dragonprism Staff **Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 132 2.0 **Price** 4,500 gp **Bulk** 1 ---
  • **Cantrip** [_gouging claw_](/Spells.aspx?ID=920), [_puff of poison_](/Spells.aspx?ID=977)
  • **1st** [_burning hands_](/Spells.aspx?ID=30), [_fear_](/Spells.aspx?ID=110)
  • **2nd** [_acid arrow_](/Spells.aspx?ID=2), [_resist energy_](/Spells.aspx?ID=256)
  • **3rd** _fear_, [_lightning bolt_](/Spells.aspx?ID=172)
  • **4th** [_fly_](/Spells.aspx?ID=125), [_reflective scales_](/Spells.aspx?ID=583)
  • **5th** [_howling blizzard_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1559), [_summon dragon_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1697)
  • **6th** [_dragon form_](/Spells.aspx?ID=88), _reflective scales_, _summon dragon_
Dragonprism Staff (Greater) **Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 132 2.0 **Price** 68,000 gp **Bulk** 1 ---
  • **7th** _summon dragon_
  • **8th** _dragon form_, _summon dragon_
  • **9th** [_summon draconic legion_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1008), _summon dragon_
name: Dragonprism Staff
